name: Teacher Simulator (itch)
description:
The power went out at school, and the students are running around setting fires and throwing grenades! Play as their teacher and trap them all in cages before they kill each other.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with the theme Out of Control.

Game Made by:

https://www.starmapsllc.com/

&

@eugenematsumura (Instagram)
